componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: • For Buyside opportunities: enter Subject's structures.

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: Has the Capital Markets Group been Consulted regarding financing or capital structure?

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: Have the above financials been subject to an audit?

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: Would the opportunity benefit from TAS Assistance?

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: If known, identify the name(s) of the clients outside counsel and/or other advisors (If any):

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: Is there a potential Fairness Opinion component to this assignment?

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: *If a Fairness Opinion will be provided the M&A Committee Memo must be sent to Chris Croft, Jennifer Muller, Rick Lacher, and Liz Hedgcock for further approval - outside counsel must also be engaged.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Form of Opinion


With respect to which of the following are we being asked to opine?

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: The consideration to be received by the Unaffiliated Stockholders in the Transaction is fair to them from a financial point of view.

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: The consideration to be received by the Company in the Transaction is fair to the Company from a financial point of view.

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: The consideration to be paid by the Company in the Transaction is fair from a financial point of view.

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: The Exchange Ratio provided for in the Transaction is fair to the Company from a financial point of view.

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: The Exchange Ratio provided for in the Transaction is fair to the Unaffiliated Stockholders from a financial point of view.

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: Is this a Related Party Transaction?

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: Conflicts Check Information - (the answers to each of these questions must be verified with each member of the deal team)

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Are there any pitches to, or engagements by, the potential client or, if known, the likely counterparty(ies), that are not listed in the completed conflicts check report?

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: Please answer yes or no to above question

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Have any of the deal team members had, or do any of them currently have, any direct or indirect financial interests in or exposures to, the potential transaction, any related transactions, the potential client or, if known, the likely counterparty(ies) (or any of their respective affiliates)?

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: Please answer yes or no to above question

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Have any of the deal team members had, or do any of them currently have, any business, employment, family or other similar relationships with the potential client or, if known, the likely counterparty(ies) (or any of their respective affiliates or management teams)?

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: Please answer yes or no to above question

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Have any of the deal team members (or to their knowledge, any other Houlihan Lokey employees) (a) had any discussions (including, but not limited to, any pitches) with any likely counterparty(ies) (or any of their respective affiliates) regarding a potential transaction with the potential client, or (b) had any discussions with such counterparty(ies) (or any of their respective affiliates) that might create the perception of a conflict of interest?

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: Please answer yes or no to above question

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Are any of the deal team members aware of any relationships or discussions not specified above that might create the perception of a conflict of interest?

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: Please answer yes or no to above question

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: *Note: Do not address with the client the existence (or lack thereof) of any potential or actual conflicts during pitches, or at any other point during the engagement process, without coordinating any such statements with the Legal Department.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: **Upon submission, a copy of this form will be sent to the Legal Department. You must coordinate with the Legal Department what (if any) steps should be taken with respect to any conflicts and/or relationships.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: A. Is this an engagement by a company with publicly held securities, where the scope of the engagement may cover a transaction involving the sale, merger or other disposition of all or a substantial part of the company's equity, assets or business?

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: Please answer yes or no to above question

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: B. Is this an engagement by a company with publicly held securities, where the scope of the engagement may cover an acquisition of another company or asset representing a material portion (approximately 10% or more)?

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: Please answer yes or no to above question

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: C. Is this engagement by a company (whether privately or publicly held), where the scope of the engagement may cover an acquisition of all or a substantial part of the equity, assets or business of another company with publicly held securities?

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: Please answer yes or no to above question

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: D. Or is this engagement by a company in connection with which we may be requested to provide a fairness or other financial opinion?

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: Please answer yes or no to above question

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
*Please inform the EU CF Co-Heads of the Opportunity and place an approved staff member in the Public role in the HL Internal Team section.

Please also consider whether the activity you wish to undertake is regulated financial activity (in which case consideration will need to be given as to the appropriate Houlihan Lokey group company to engage on this Opportunity). Please contact Legal if uncertain.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: *Please add Mark Mikullitz, Rick A. Lacher or Steven Tishman to the Public role in the HL Internal Team section.

componentInstanceProperties.name: label
componentInstanceProperties.value: Please confirm that a group head has approved prior to submitting to the committee
